item.title: lyndsey add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "I may not have been sure about what really did interest me, but I was absolutely sure about what didn't." -- Albert Camus

item.title: lyndsey add a quote by Diana Wynne Jones
item.description: "My shining dishonesty will be the salvation of me." -- Diana Wynne Jones

item.title: lyndsey add a quote by Diana Wynne Jones
item.description: "Go to bed, you fool," Calcifer said sleepily. "You're drunk." "Who, me?" said Howl. "I assure you, my friends, I am cone sold stober." He got up and stalked upstairs, feeling for the wall as if he thought it might escape him unless he kept in touch with it. His bedroom door did escape him." -- Diana Wynne Jones

item.title: lyndsey add a quote by Diana Wynne Jones
item.description: "I'm going up to my room now, where I may die." -- Diana Wynne Jones

item.title: lyndsey add a quote by Dave Eggers
item.description: "We lose weeks like buttons, like pencils." -- Dave Eggers

item.title: lyndsey add a quote by Charlotte Brontë
